name: URadialForceComponent
doc: Used to emit a radial force or impulse that can affect physics objects and or destructible objects.

Radius: The radius to apply the force or impulse in
Falloff: How the force or impulse should fall off as object are further away from the center
ImpulseStrength: How strong the impulse should be
ForceStrength: How strong the force should be
DestructibleDamage: If > 0.f, will cause damage to destructible meshes as well
ObjectTypesToAffect: The object types that are affected by this radial force
bImpulseVelChange: If true, the impulse will ignore mass of objects and will always result in a fixed velocity change
bIgnoreOwningActor: If true, do not apply force/impulse to any physics objects that are part of the Actor that owns this component.

methods.name: AddObjectTypeToAffect
methods.doc: Add an object type for this radial force to affect

methods.name: RemoveObjectTypeToAffect
methods.doc: Remove an object type that is affected by this radial force
